unnormalised: I remember when I first started investing in the stock market back in '08. Bought 100 shares of Infosys at Rs. 950 each, thought I was a genius, only to see it dip to Rs. 700 a few months later. Learned a hard lesson that day!
normalised: I remember when I first started investing in the stock market back in two thousand and eight. Bought one hundred shares of Infosys at rupee nine hundred and fifty each, thought I was a genius, only to see it dip to rupee seven hundred a few months later. Learned a hard lesson that day!
